author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: مدّعیان محبّت از جمال قدم شرم نمائید و از زحمات و مشقّاتی که در سبیل الهی حمل نموده پند گیرید و متنبّه شوید اگر مقصود این اعمال سخیفه و افعال باطله بوده حمل این زحمات بچه جهت شده هر سارق و فاسقی باین اعمال و اقوال شما قبل از ظهور عامل
translation: Say: Be ashamed, O ye that call yourselves the lovers of the Ancient Beauty! Be ye admonished by the tribulation He hath suffered, by the burden of anguish He hath carried for the sake of God. Let your eyes be opened. To what purpose hath He labored, if the manifold trials He hath endured are, in the end, to result in such contemptible professions, and such wretched conduct? Every robber, every worker of iniquity, hath, in the days prior to My Revelation, uttered these same words, and performed these same deeds.
